tasks.task: Selecting time windows for agricultural data visualization
subtasks: Choose 250 meter resolution crop planting map from the US Department of Agriculture
Select prism historical daily maximum temperature weather data
Zoom in and select a rectangle in the Midwest (midwestern US)
Set time window for crop type to January 1st, 2017
Set time window for maximum temperature to June 2017
Clicking on a point to see crop type and numerical code
Checking the time series data for temperature
Launching an animation of temperature variation during June
